relations-presse.title: media relations
relations-presse.agence-top-title: Thanks to its network of media opinion leaders, Sandie Roy Paris guarantees extensive and high-quality coverage of products and corporate information in both the print media and among digital players: blogs and social networks. An active, effective and rallying approach that never fails to create a buzz.

photo-part.title: PRODUCTS
photo-part.paragraph: Our goal is total visibility and that’s exactly what brands can expect from Sandie Roy Paris thanks to services including product placements and collection management, distribution of press releases, look books and product information to targeted contacts.

photo-part.title: INSTITUTIONAL
photo-part.paragraph: Sandie Roy Paris offers creative consulting as well as global and customized communication by designing and implementing institutional media relation campaigns featuring brand sagas, in-depth articles, one-to-one interviews and press conferences.

photo-part.title: DIGITAL
photo-part.paragraph: Mindful of the on-going growth and development of new media, Sandie Roy Paris instantly adjusts and reinvents its digital communication proposals thanks to a network of ultra-connected, digital key players.

relations-publiques.title: public relations
relations-publiques.agence-top-title: Public relations: a service to complement media relations for a 360° communication strategy. SRP connects brands with traditional and digital opinion leaders and ensures a close collaboration, while designing relevant and exclusive content to catch the eye on new media.

photo-part.title: BLOGGERS
photo-part.paragraph: Sandie Roy Paris delivers high-quality coverage on influential blogs thanks to an assortment of special initiatives: customized partnerships, dinner events, trips, personalized product seeding, one-to-one meetings and store openings.

photo-part.title: OPINION LEADERS
photo-part.paragraph: Once connected, brands and opinion leaders engage in a mutually beneficial relationship, forming a true community with close ties to SRP. We unite a network of opinion leaders around our clients to create a tight-knit community based on clear and established codes. We proclaim the singularity of each brand thanks to product placements and invitations to targeted events.

photo-part.title: SOCIAL NETWORKS
photo-part.paragraph: Sandie Roy Paris designs and produces original and unique content intended for the social networks of each of its clients, via its selective network of opinion leaders, bloggers and media outlets.

production.title: production
production.agence-top-title: An “Agency 3.0,” Sandie Roy Paris offers global, customized and innovative guidance of the finest quality, putting forth various production proposals to convey brands' news and messages.

photo-part.title: EVENTS
photo-part.paragraph: With a flair for creating experiences, Sandie Roy Paris designs tailor-made events targeting the media and opinion leaders: cocktail receptions, press presentations, dinner parties, press trips, store openings, collection launches.

photo-part.title: PARTNERSHIPS
photo-part.paragraph: Thanks to its powerful network spanning the worlds of fashion, luxury and the general public, Sandie Roy Paris develops targeted, open and seamless strategies encompassing a variety of sectors, from fashion to lifestyle, not to mention culture. An effective way to heighten a brands’ image and value.

photo-part.title: PUBLISHING
photo-part.paragraph: Sandie Roy Paris offers its clients consulting, design and production services for lookbooks, catalogues and advertising campaigns.

about.title: about
about.agence-top-title: Style, immediacy, proximity: Sandie Roy’s savoir-faire is to energize brands. A veritable “Communication House” within fashion and lifestyle, the agency caters to both the luxury sector and the general public. For 15 years, Sandie Roy has had the ear of key players and opinion leaders in the fashion and lifestyle industry, both in France and abroad. SRP’s mission is to empower the brands it represents.
about.agence-sub-title: Its missions? To draw out the unique and sparkling spirit of each brand. SRP thus focuses on customized and bespoke guidance, offering a range of services to enhance brands’ image and power, in accordance with their needs and objectives. The agency offers a comprehensive and seamless variety of 360° consulting services: brand strategy, press and digital relations, production, active presence on social networks. Iconoclast agency, Sandie Roy Paris earns brands' trust thanks to its network of opinion leaders and its “French touch”. Partnership, expertise and uniqueness are the words we live by.
about.equipe-sub-title: Organized by skill sets and guided by consultants for specific missions, the team revels in speaking out and leading the way through a worldwide scene of avant-garde and pop culture.
about.title-b: L’agence Sandie Roy Paris est une maison de communication experte en mode luxe et marques grand public, des créateurs émérgents aux marques internationales.
about.small-paragraph-a: Située Place des Victoires au cœur de Paris, triangle d’or et quartier stratégique du réseau média, l’agence dispose d’un vaste showroom installé dans le cadre cosy d’un loft Parisien.

photo-part.title: ÉVÈNEMENTS
photo-part.paragraph: L’agence Sandie Roy Paris conçoit des événements sur mesure dédiés à la presse et aux influenceurs : cocktail parties, présentation presse, dîners presse, voyages de presse, inaugurations boutiques...

photo-part.title: édition
photo-part.paragraph: L’agence Sandie Roy Paris propose à ses clients ses services de conseil, conception et production de lookbooks, catalogues et campagnes de publicité.

photo-part.title: PARTENARIATS
photo-part.paragraph: Grâce à son réseau mode et grand public, l’agence Sandie Roy Paris croise et mixe la mode à d’autres secteurs pour faire rayonner plus largement l’image et la valeur des marques.

agence-promo.title: Agency
agence-promo.paragraph: The agency has a vast showroom in a cozy Parisian loft, located on Place des Victoires, a strategic neighborhood and media hotspot in the heart of the French capital’s Golden Triangle.

equipe-promo.title: Team
equipe-promo.paragraph: Sandie Roy is a passionate storyteller. To pursue her passion, she assembled a team of twenty top-level experts with varied and complementary profiles from the worlds of luxury, communication, culture, digital technologies and art. DJs, opinion leaders, press managers, architects and more. All characters and all areas of expertise find their niche in this mix. A single battle cry: immediacy. A single rule: turn motion in to a source of ideas.
